item.title: Streaming Audio from Linux to OSX with Pulseaudio
item.description: This is not for everyone, and I know that there are better things I can do (like hook up a pair of speakers). Let me explain. I have a Fedora box that I use as a home personal server. It runs various services. However because the more monitors the better, and I believe in having as many HUDS and graphs as humanly possible, it IS running X and has a monitor attached to it.
